type.name: org.gradle.api.Namer
type.description: * A namer is capable of providing a name based on some inherent characteristic of an object. * * @param <T> The type of object that the namer can name

method.name: determineName
method.description: * Determines the name of the given object. * * @param object The object to determine the name of * @return The object's inherent name. Never null. * @throws RuntimeException If the name cannot be determined or is null
